title: Anderson Cooper | Bombshell Report Ties January 6 Organizers to GOP Congress Members: A Closer Look
description:
Seth takes a closer look at a bombshell new report that alleges GOP members of Congress had planning sessions with organizers that led to the January 6 insurrection.

Then, Anderson Cooper talks about his book Vanderbilt: The Rise and Fall of an American Dynasty, posing as an assistant for his mother’s Instagram account and confronting a Q-Anon conspiracy theorist who believed he eats babies. 

See Privacy Policy at https://art19.com/privacy and California Privacy Notice at https://art19.com/privacy#do-not-sell-my-info.
